verses.name: Genesis 25:9
verses.text: And his sons Isaac and Ishmael buried him in the cave of Machpelah, in the field of Ephron the son of Zohar the Hittite, which is before Mamre;

verses.name: Genesis 25:10
verses.text: The field which Abraham purchased of the sons of Heth: there was Abraham buried, and Sarah his wife.

verses.name: Genesis 25:11
verses.text: And it came to pass after the death of Abraham, that God blessed his son Isaac; and Isaac dwelt by the well Lahai–roi.

verses.name: Genesis 25:12
verses.text: Now these are the generations of Ishmael, Abraham’s son, whom Hagar the Egyptian, Sarah’s handmaid, bare unto Abraham:
